package unit3;

public class capicua {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		int n =232;
		int a,
		int b=0;
		int k;
		k=n;
	    while(n!=0)
		{    
		a=n%10;
		b=b*10+a;
		n=n/10;
	     	}
	     	System.out.print("\nel numero invertido es :"+b);
	     if(s==k)
		System.out.println ("\nEs capicua ");
		else
		System.out.println ("\nNo es capicua ");
	    }
}
